title: Creative Brief
description: Campaign-level creative context for AI-powered creative generation. Provides the layer between brand identity (stable across campaigns) and individual creative execution (per-request). A brand has one identity (defined in brand.json) but different creative briefs for each campaign or flight.

name.description: Campaign or flight name for identification

objective.description: Campaign objective that guides creative tone and call-to-action strategy

tone.description: Desired tone for this campaign, modulating the brand's base tone (e.g., 'playful and festive', 'premium and aspirational')

audience.description: Target audience description for this campaign

territory.description: Creative territory or positioning the campaign should occupy

key_messages.description: Key messages to communicate in priority order

reference_assets.description: Visual and strategic reference materials such as mood boards, product shots, example creatives, and strategy documents
